promptForName: Generate a unique, original, creative, single-word pokemon name for a chibi cute epic fish water-type wearing ancient armor. It can be found in ocean-like environments. Do not use the words pokemon or water. Ony answer with the generated name:
promptForDescription: Generate a short, original, creative Pokedex description for Aquamite, a chibi cute epic fish water-type pokemon. It can be found in ocean-like environments It has the following abilities: water-spout. Be creative about its day-to-day life. Do not use the word fish or water or the ability names. Use a maximum of 50 characters:
promptForVisual: mdjrny-v4 style portrait of water-type pokemon, fish-like, epic, digital art, sugimori, chibi, centered, full body, teal and blue ambient lighting
generatedDescription: Aquamite swims in the depths of oceans and coasts, creating sprays and magical splashes! With its water-spout, it brings joy and fresh energy ...
